title: CFCs lead to global warming and ozone depletion

content.question: Which of the following is an important contributor to both global warming and ozone depletion?

choices.label: An increase in the concentration of carbon dioxide to higher-than-preindustrial levels
A buildup of methane in the stratosphere to higher-than-preindustrial levels
An increase in the levels of ultraviolet radiation reaching Earthâ€™s surface
An increase in the amount of infrared solar radiation absorbed in the troposphere
A release of chlorofluorocarbons to the atmosphere

content.answer: A release of chlorofluorocarbons to the atmosphere

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
